issues.description: The problem statement text refers to the method for calculating the total number of students as `get_total_number_of_students()` (snake_case), while the UML diagram, template repository, and solution repository consistently use `getTotalNumberOfStudents()` (camelCase). This inconsistency in naming convention for the same conceptual method can confuse students trying to implement the method based on the problem description.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the problem statement text on line 41 to use `getTotalNumberOfStudents()` instead of `get_total_number_of_students()` to match the UML diagram, template, and solution, ensuring consistent naming across all artifacts.
